notes_translated.fr:
Le débit moyen (m3 s-1) du fleuve Fraser mesuré à station Hope. Présenté comme le débit moyen pour l'année civil (janvier à décembre) et pour l'année débit (avril cette année à marsannée prochaine).                                                                                                                                 

Citation correcte : Richard J. Beamish, Chrys-Ellen M. Neville, Barbara L. Thomson, Paul J. Harrison, and Mike St. John. A Relationship between Fraser River Discharge and Interannual Production of Pacific Salmon (Oncorhynchus spp.) and Pacific herring (Clupea pallasi) in the Strait of Georgia. Canadian Journal of Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences. 51(12): 2843-2855. https://doi.org/10.1139/f94-283

Résumé : https://cdnsciencepub.com/doi/abs/10.1139/f94-283
notes_translated.en:
The mean discharge (m3 s-1) of the Fraser River measured at Hope station. Presented as the mean discharge for an annual year (January through December) and for a flow year (April present year through March next year).                                                                                                                                     

Correct citation: Richard J. Beamish, Chrys-Ellen M. Neville, Barbara L. Thomson, Paul J. Harrison, and Mike St. John. A Relationship between Fraser River Discharge and Interannual Production of Pacific Salmon (Oncorhynchus spp.) and Pacific herring (Clupea pallasi) in the Strait of Georgia. Canadian Journal of Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences. 51(12): 2843-2855. https://doi.org/10.1139/f94-283

Abstract: https://cdnsciencepub.com/doi/abs/10.1139/f94-283

creator: Jacquelynne King
